ti:work.ti:title: Quomodo quis suos in virtute sentiat profectus

ti:translation.ti:label: How a Man May Become Aware of His Progress in Virtue
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Moralia, Vol. I. Babbitt, Frank Cole, translator. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press. London: William Heinemann Ltd. 1927 (printing).

ti:translation.ti:label: How a Man May Be Sensible of His Progress in Virtue.
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. II. Goodwin, William W., editor; Tod(d), Hugh translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company. Cambridge. 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: πῶς ἄν τις αἴσθοιτο ἑαυτοῦ προκόπτοντος ἐπʼ ἀρετή
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol I. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner. 1888.
